bot_fixed_capabilities_summary: This bot trades BTCUSDT futures. It handles API communication, WebSocket streams, risk flags, and an independent profit taker. AI's role is to provide specific trading decisions and strategy updates based on analysis. The bot will automatically close a position if PnL >= 3 USDT. AI can suggest an earlier close. The bot enforces a 180s timeout for pending entry orders.
